com.zcking.furyengine.lighting

Class SceneLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zcking.furyengine.lighting.SceneLight

  • public class SceneLight
extends java.lang.Object
    Conveniently wraps all the common lighting objects for a scene (e.g. ambient light, point lights, spot lights, etc.).
